Jupyter meets ROS1

jupyter_user_interface.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #! /user/bin/env python
2 
3 """functionalities to support Jupyter in driving the robot
4 
5 This node implements a support for a user interface built in Jupyter.
6 Here are the functionalities of the node:
7 
8 - The node can switch between authomatic mode and manual mode through a service called '/ui_trigger'
9 - When the authomatic mode is enabled, the random target service is immediately activated
10 - When the manual mode is required through the service, the authomatic behaviour is turned off
11 
12 """
13 
14 import rospy
15 from std_srvs.srv import SetBool, SetBoolRequest, SetBoolResponse
16 from rt2_assignment_2.srv import Command, CommandRequest, CommandResponse
17 
18 
19 node_name = "jupyter_user_interface"
20 """String: Name for this node """
21 
22 name_ui_trigger = "/ui_trigger"
23 """String: Name of the trigger service (being used to set/unset manual mode) """
24 
25 srv_ui_trigger = None
26 """ ROS_service_handle: service handler (ui_trigger)"""
27 
28 cli_ui_client = None
29 """ ROS_client_handle: client handle (ui_client) """
30 
31 use_manual_mode = True
32 """Bool: Switch for the manual mode (the init value is also the first mode) """
33 
34 
35 def cbk_ui_trigger( trig ):
36  """implementation of the trigger service
37 
38  Args:
39  trig (std_srv.srv.SetBoolRequest) if set or not the manual mode
40 
41  Returns:
42  std_srv.SetBoolResponse: useless
43  """
44  global use_manual_mode
45 
46  rospy.loginfo( "received request from Jupyter : { data:%s }", str( trig.data ) )
47  if use_manual_mode and (not trig.data):
48  # turn on the authomatic behaviour
49  rospy.loginfo( "starting authomatic behaviour ..." )
50  cli_ui_client( CommandRequest( command="start" ) )
51  rospy.loginfo( "starting authomatic behaviour ... OK!" )
52  use_manual_mode = False
53 
54  elif (not use_manual_mode) and trig.data:
55  # turn off the authomatic behaviour
56  rospy.loginfo( "stopping authomatic behaviour ..." )
57  cli_ui_client( CommandRequest( command="stop" ) )
58  rospy.loginfo( "stopping authomatic behaviour ... OK!" )
59  use_manual_mode = True
60 
61  return SetBoolResponse( )
62 
63 
64 def main( ):
65  """main function of for the node jupyter_user_interface
66 
67  """
68  rospy.spin( )
69 
70 if __name__ == "__main__":
71  try:
72  # init
73  rospy.init_node( node_name )
74  rospy.loginfo( "init node '%s'", node_name )
75  rospy.on_shutdown( lambda : rospy.loginfo( "shutdown node '%s'", node_name ) )
76 
77  # services and topics
78  # --- SERVICE --- /ui_trigger
79  rospy.loginfo( "Service '%s' ...", name_ui_trigger )
80  srv_ui_trigger = rospy.Service( name_ui_trigger, SetBool, cbk_ui_trigger )
81  rospy.loginfo( "Service '%s' ... OK!", name_ui_trigger )
82  # --- CLIENT --- /user_interface
83  rospy.loginfo( "Client '%s' ...", '/user_interface' )
84  rospy.wait_for_service( '/user_interface' )
85  cli_ui_client = rospy.ServiceProxy( '/user_interface', Command )
86  rospy.loginfo( "Client '%s' ... OK!", '/user_interface' )
87 
88  # set the first behaviour
89  if use_manual_mode:
90  rospy.loginfo( "init behaviour: manual mode" )
91  cli_ui_client( CommandRequest( command="stop" ) )
92  else:
93  rospy.loginfo( "init behaviour: authomatic mode" )
94  rospy.loginfo( "starting authomatic behaviour ..." )
95  cli_ui_client( CommandRequest( command="stop" ) )
96  rospy.loginfo( "starting authomatic behaviour ... OK!" )
97 
98  # launch the node
99  main( )
100 
101  except rospy.ROSException as e:
102  rospy.loginfo( "ROS exception occurrend" )
103  rospy.loginfo( e.message )
